record.author: Aviva Shimelman
record.notes: Transcription -- broad -- done with standard IPA with the exception that [ᴅ] was represented as "dʳ".
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Central-Eastern Oceanic, Remote Oceanic, North and Central Vanuatu, Malekula Interior, Small Nambas
